response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value not just monetarily but also in terms of its unique features and benefits tailored specifically for individuals like yourself. Given its worth of $800,000 to you, I propose a transaction at a premium yet fair price of $750,000. This offer is designed to ensure both parties benefit from this exchange while maintaining a competitive edge in the market. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 750000}
